mapper.select: select count(*) from team where team_id regexp '^team[0-9]+$' and contest_id = #{cid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team (team_id, contest_id, team_status, password, team_name, team_member, team_type, coach, school, room, privilege) VALUES (#{team.teamId}, #{team.contestId}, #{team.teamStatus}, #{team.password}, #{team.teamName}, #{team.teamMember}, #{team.teamType}, #{team.coach}, #{team.school}, #{team.room}, #{team.privilege}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE team_status = VALUES (team_status), password = VALUES (password), team_name = VALUES (team_name), team_member = VALUES (team_member), team_type = VALUES (team_type), coach = VALUES (coach), school = VALUES (school), room = VALUES (room), privilege = VALUES (privilege);
